title: Definition
context: ARTICLE 7. SAVINGS AND LOAN ASSOCIATIONS PART I. GENERAL PROVISIONS ยง412:7-100 Definition. In this article, &ldquo;savings and loan association&rdquo; means a corporation that has the authority to operate as a savings and loan association under this chapter. [L 1993, c 350, pt of ยง1; am L 2006, c 228, ยง37]
